description: This source file sets up and starts an HTTP server using an Express app imported from './app'. It configures the server to listen on a specified port and host, handles graceful shutdown on SIGTERM, and exports the server instance.

methods.name: app.listen
methods.description: Starts the server listening on the specified port and host.

methods.name: process.on
methods.description: Registers a handler for the SIGTERM signal to gracefully shut down the server.

methods.name: server.close
methods.description: Stops the server from accepting new connections and calls callback when closed.

methods.name: console.log
methods.description: Outputs messages to the console for server startup and shutdown events.

methods.name: process.exit
methods.description: Exits the process after server shutdown.
